attributes.action: ban the e-petition of banning the burqa!
attributes.additional_details:
The petition on banning the burqa is ridiculous, Jack Holt the creator has a disability in understanding peoples' emotions through their words, a woman who has chosen to have her face or body covered and protected is fully aware how she must communicate in order to get her emotion, opinion, argument, statement and her feelings across, like normal human beings, our voice which we do not veil.
Talk about respect, women veiling themselves does not disrespect a country, maybe a minority of individuals who have difficulty understanding words only, and in that case the normal humans who are able can assist in interpreting if need be.
